text: Coat of arms of Luigi Martella Luigi Martella (9 March 1948 - 6 July 2015) was a Roman Catholic bishop. Ordained to the priesthood in 1977, Martella was named bishop of the Roman Catholic Diocese of Molfetta-Ruvo-Giovinazzo- Terlizza, Italy.Luigi Martella ==Notes== Category:1948 births Category:2015 deaths Category:Italian Roman Catholic bishops
title: Luigi Martella
